rows.label: qst650413_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, hey... It's Nascion.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0002
rows.name:
He looks so sad... We should
try and help if we can!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0003
rows.name: Hey, guy! What's the matter?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0004
rows.name:
Mum and dad have been out for
a long time now and so...

rows.label: qst650413_msg0005
rows.name: And now you're hungry and upset?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0006
rows.name: How did you know...?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0007
rows.name: Oh, you know...I'm just kind like that!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0008
rows.name:
If you've got some ingredients
at home, we can try and make
you something! How about it?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0009
rows.name: Really?!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0010
rows.name: Of course!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0011
rows.name:
Hibana, think twice. You
don't want to scar another
kid for life, now, do you?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0012
rows.name:
That's not gonna happen! I've
been practicing each and every
day since that last time!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0013
rows.name: Oh, is that right?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0014
rows.name: You don't believe in me at all, do you?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0015
rows.name:
Well, in that case, why don't
you make him some food, hmm?
Seeing how you're so clever.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0016
rows.name: Not a chance.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0017
rows.name:
Come to think of it, I don't think
I've ever seen you cook, Hikari.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0018
rows.name:
Shut up, Rex. I'll have you know that
part of me has been sealed away, due
to numerous complex circumstances...

rows.label: qst650413_msg0019
rows.name:
Well *my hero* Homura is strong and kind
and still has time to do stuff around the
house... I have so much respect for her.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0020
rows.name: And then there's you, Hikari...

rows.label: qst650413_msg0021
rows.name:
Do I look like I care about
your respect, Hibana?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0022
rows.name: Well now you're just being rude.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0023
rows.name:
And you're a simpleton,
and boring to boot.

rows.label: qst650413_msg0024
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]And you're a, a, a...a jerkface!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0025
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]I'm just straight and to
the point, like a rocket,
or, or, or a flare, or...!

rows.label: qst650413_msg0101
rows.name:
Wow, they're really getting into it...
I'd hate to get between them. Rex,
can you help me make a sandwich?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0102
rows.name: Sorry you had to see that...

rows.label: qst650413_msg0103
rows.name:
We'll get some proper food
together next time, yeah?

rows.label: qst650413_msg0104
rows.name: Awesome!
